title: Media Minister warns Opposition of another massive defeat at the General elections
content: Asian Tribune – By Anjana Jayashan in Colombo Media Minister Lakshman Yapa Abeywardene challenged the People’s Liberation Front (JVP) leader Somawansha Amarasinghe to go to courts with their popularized allegation of “computer gilmart” at the presidential election.
